user enters "Abc@123456" into EPG into password text field
user clicks EPG Login button
system displays EPG Admin dashboard
EPG user clicks Administration menu
EPG user clicks Merchants submenu
EPG system displays Merchants management page
EPG user clicks on create link
EPG user click on Main Information tab
EPG user enters "newusername11" into EPG Merchant Login text field
EPG user enters "Abenezerwondemu" into Merchant Name text field
EPG user enters "1234" into MCC text field
EPG user enters "https://abenezer.com/" into Merchant Website Address text field
EPG user enters selects "EN" Payment Language dropdown
EPG user enters "EN" into List Of Locals text field
EPG user enters "6" into Pan Masked Digit Count text field
EPG user selects the Merchant Permissions
EPG user clicks on Acquirer tab for new Merchant
EPG user clicks on add new Acquirer button
EPG user selects "BunnaBankAcquirer" from new Acquirer Name dropdown
EPG user enters "AB123456" into Processing Merchant ID text field
EPG user enters "12345678" into Terminal ID text field
EPG user enters "newusername" into User Login text field
EPG user enters "password" into User Password text field
EPG user clicks on Save Acquirer button
EPG user checks Default Acquirer checkbox
EPG user clicks on Additional information tab
EPG user checks ETB under currency list
EPG user selects "ETB (230)" Default Currency dropdown
EPG user enters "1" into Number of payment attempts text field
EPG user selects "Version 1" from Version of getOrderStatusExtended text field
EPG user selects "Version 2" from Version of getPTwoPStatus text field
EPG user checks Use verification checkbox
EPG user checks External fraud control checkbox
EPG user enters "Fraud control name" into Name for fraud control text field
EPG user checks Use name for fraud control checkbox
EPG user enters "1" into Duration of displaying order information text field
EPG user selects "NO_PREFERENCE" ThreeDSTwo Requester Challenge Indicator dropdown
EPG user clicks on Address tab
EPG user enters "Ethiopia" into into Country text field
EPG user clicks on Save merchant button
EPG user clicks logout link

system displays EPG Admin dashboard
